synonyms: śrī-sadāśiva kavirāja—of the name Śrī Sadāśiva Kavirāja; baḍa—great; mahāśaya—respectable gentleman; śrī-puruṣottama-dāsa—of the name Śrī Puruṣottama dāsa; tāṅhāra tanaya—his son.
translation: The twenty-third and twenty-fourth prominent devotees of Nityānanda Prabhu were Sadāśiva Kavirāja and his son Puruṣottama dāsa, who was the tenth gopāla.
